mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(category_id, product_name, price, image_url, description) VALUES(#{category_id}, #{product_name}, #{price}, #{image_url}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, category_id, product_name, price, image_url, description FROM product WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
